heading: No-code platforms
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: Framer â€” Design and ship your dream site with zero code
productCards.description: A no-code platform to create responsive webpages with text, links, media, and incredible animations.

productCards.title: Webflow â€” Create custom, responsive websites, visually
productCards.description: Take control of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in a visual canvas. Webflow generates clean, semantic code thatâ€™s ready to publish or hand to developers.

productCards.title: Bubble â€” Build web apps without code, entirely visually
productCards.description: Design, develop, and launch production-grade applications without code

productCards.title: Expo â€” An open-source platform for building native apps
productCards.description: Build, deploy, and quickly iterate on native Android, iOS, and web apps from the same JavaScript codebase.

productCards.title: Zapier â€” Connect your apps and automate workflows
productCards.description: Easy automation for busy people. Zapier empowers you to automate your work across 5,000+ appsâ€”so you can move forward, faster.

productCards.title: Cycle â€” Your feedback hub, on autopilot
productCards.description: Cycle is the fastest way for your team to capture product feedback and share customer insights - without the busywork ðŸ‘‰ https://www.cycle.app

productCards.title: FlutterFlow â€” Build cross-platform mobile apps visually
productCards.description: Create beautiful UI, generate clean code, and deploy to the app stores or web in one click. Fully extensible with custom code.

productCards.title: Xano â€” The fastest way to build and deploy a scalable backend
productCards.description: Build a scalable backend for your app using no code. Transform, filter, and integrate with data from anywhere.

productCards.title: AWS Amplify â€” JavaScript library for app development using cloud services
productCards.description: AWS Amplify provides a declarative and easy-to-use API for cloud operations. You can build cloud-powered web and mobile experiences with AWS Amplify and goes well with any JavaScript based frontend library.

productCards.title: Retool â€” Build internal tools, remarkably fast
productCards.description: An application development platform that enables developers to combine the benefits of traditional software development with a drag-and-drop UI editor and AI to build internal tools radically faster. Deploy it anywhere, connect to any internal service, import your libraries, debug with your toolchain, and share it securely to users to ensure good and well-governed software by default.
